name: Wise Man Neos (Skill Card)
skill_activation: nAt the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
"Elemental HERO Neos" and Fusion Monsters that mention "Elemental HERO Neos" as material gain the following effect.
● Before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to half that opponent's monster's original ATK.
